channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former VP Harris endorses Mamdani for NYC Mayor as some Democrats stay silent

item.title: Zackery Nazario Died Subway Surfing. Is Social Media to Blame?
item.description: Norma Nazario didn’t understand what had motivated her 15-year-old son to subway surf. Then she found his phone.

item.title: The surprisingly lucrative business of making a list of 500 stocks
item.description: What even is the business of the S&P 500, and how does it make so much money?

item.title: Jury to Decide Fate of Ryan Routh, Man Accused of Trying to Assassinate Trump
item.description: The man accused of lying in wait with a rifle at a Florida golf course in 2024 mounted his own defense in a 12-day trial.

item.title: Powell Stresses ‘Challenging Situation’ for Fed as Rate Debate Intensifies
item.description: Rising inflation and a weakening labor market have created a bind for the central bank, Jerome H. Powell, its chair, warned on Tuesday.

item.title: Saudi Grand Mufti, an Archconservative in a Changing Kingdom, Dies
item.description: The death of Abdulaziz Al Asheikh, Saudi Arabia’s most senior cleric, was the symbolic end of an era as the kingdom transforms.
